_header: Jesu Christ heaven king / Be at my beginning
Title(s): Chateau d’Amour ; De Principio Creationis mundi
_description: ‘De Principio Creationis mundi’, an Englishing of Grosseteste’s Chateau d’Amour — in couplets

BodAsh61.First Lines:
Ihesu cryst heuyn kyngeBe at my be gynningeThere is no man
                    þat may ȝelpeBot he hath nede of godes helpe…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…All contake leyd schall beMy wyll it is I schall saue
                    ye
